validation_steps.1: Fetch latest branch state from GitHub
validation_steps.2: Query Back4App deployment logs for this branch via API
validation_steps.3: Compare timestamps and checksums of backend/Dockerfile, backend/requirements.txt, and frontend/package.json
validation_steps.4: If mismatch detected → halt commit and log 'Branch out of sync with Back4App, please rebuild before commit'
validation_steps.5: If in sync → proceed with commit normally
